value.title: Dataflows and power query - November 2020 update

value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments! value.title: M intellisense in Notepad++ for Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #38
value.excerpt: Intellisense is a code completion tool developed by Microsoft to help developers code faster and syntax free.  Power Query or Power BI does not have Intellisense built in yet, but it is a highly requested feature.  You can vote for Intellisense feature to be added in Power Query or Power BI here: https://ideas.powerbi.com/forums/265200-power-bi-ideas/suggestions/7202913-improve-the-advanced-query-editor

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other.
